Brooklyn faces power outages as crews work to restore electricity, while NYC braces for severe weather with freezing rain and dense fog advisories; Mayor-elect Mamdani's swearing-in is set for New Year's Day amid ongoing discussions about public safety and infrastructure improvements.

### Risks & Alerts

- Hundreds in the dark in Brooklyn as crews work to restore power. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilgFBVV95cUxQc0wyVnE2NFk3S2dJRi1QRVBCa0hpaXVPMkV4Q3hyQm1LM25rMGxENVpabnF0aGlHa2M2QWgzekN1UkdfY094aERVbndibk1kT0JXb2thVHd2LUtoMlg3cnk0Uk44Vl9JOGZIYmZUMDhFQk8td3hDU29QWVZ6bkx1Y240Y3hURnVpNGgtbnlhZy1tZjhDVUE?oc=5)
- Freezing rain advisory for Staten Island and the rest of NYC. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Dense fog advisory in effect for Staten Island. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Temperatures in NYC area will reach about 50°F before dropping with 40 mph gusts. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxNTFhDYjBYSG5zTE1reFZRcmctZ3NST3lCZ3I0Yk5fOF9GUGNJRUVaenRHR1B4QnpzRHI2cG5lRk9taVhBZ2t4ajQtLXNoUlFYUExLOHd0U2dNRzdJaWVFc1luV1R2U2pYYXhnbWdrSUdBc3ByUmktWmk1TFliU2RpNHVya0JMdDFORG9OSW9yU2NFS21JUDU5SzRkVm82VW8tNkR1VEdQcTk4UGU4NFhvZjNYbw?oc=5)
- Two fast-moving fires under investigation in Queens. ### Civics & Politics

- Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's swearing-in will occur at Old City Hall subway station at midnight on New Year's Day. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC Commissioner Louis Molina resigns but will receive pay until his NYPD pension begins.
